uk.co.dancowan.robots.srv.ui.views.camera
Class BinWidgetRadioManager

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.dancowan.robots.srv.ui.views.camera.BinWidgetRadioManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Listener
public class BinWidgetRadioManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Listener

Class to manage selection state of a collection of ColourBinWidgets as if they were radio buttons.

Only one widget in the collection can be selected at any one time.

Author:
Dan Cowan
